com.uno.dbbc.checkers

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uno.dbbc.checkers.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing a piece in Checker. A piece can have one of the two colors: Light (given by Piece.LIGHT) and Dark (given by Piece.DARK). A piece can become king if it reaches the opposite end.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece(java.lang.String color)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an instance of Piece with given color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the piece (has to be Piece.LIGHT or Piece.DARK).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws IllegalArgumentException if the given color is not equal to Piece.LIGHT or Piece.DARK

    • Method Detail

      • setCell

        public void setCell(Cell givenCell)
        Sets the placed piece of the given Cell to be this Piece.
        Parameters:
        givenCell - The Cell in which this Piece is to be placed.

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell()
        Returns:
        Returns the cell on which this Piece is placed.

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor()
        Returns:
        Returns the color of this Piece (either Piece.LIGHT or Piece.DARK).

      • isKing

        public boolean isKing()
        Returns:
        Returns if this Piece is a King. Returns true if this Piece is King, false otherwise.

      • makeKing

        public void makeKing()
        Makes this piece a King.

      • getOpponentColor

        public static java.lang.String getOpponentColor(java.lang.String givenColor)
        Returns the color of the opponent player i.e. returns the color opposite of this Piece

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if the given Object is equal to this Piece.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be compared
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given object is equal to this Piece, false otherwise. The given object is equal to this Piece if the given object is an instance of Piece, has the same color as this Piece and is located in the same Cell location as this Piece.
